entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Access Violation starting with .NET 8.0.0 when debugging console application with Visual Studio on Windows x64 #96322
  • Cast to nullable integer surprisingly fails on non-integers #96314
  • JsonSourceGenerator InvalidOperationException Unreachable with C# 12 using alias #96313

Closed

  • Api Proposal: Enumerable.Type() extension #29809
    Future
  • Clean up ifdefs in EventSource #90433
    9.0.0
  • WinHttpHandler assertion failure #90613
    Future
  • Several XML tests are sporadically failing in CI due to OOMs #82894
    9.0.0
  • Explore using Aho-Corasick in Regex's FindFirstChar #62447
    9.0.0
  • Consider adding more IndexOf variations #75175
    Future
  • Delete redundant vectorization code paths #49846
    Future
  • Consider Android development Codespace #77851
    9.0.0
  • ObjectDisposedException from FileConfigurationProvider in net8.0 #96282
  • Unhandled error: System.IO.FileLoadException: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource, Version=6.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51' or one of its dependencies. The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80131040) #95000
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Build Linux NativeAOT runtime packs #96323
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #96319
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • [ILCompiler] Fix formatting error in EHClause.WriteTo #96317
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix typo in GetTypeNameDebug #96320
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ILLink] Fix cut & paste error in IsTypeOf #96316
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove double check for context.Target.PointerSize == 4 #96318
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create a Codespace for Android development #96257
    area-Meta, os-android

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    tenet-performance, area-VM-coreclr
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP & WS #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Precise reflection-visible delegate target analysis #96166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • PGO: Profile Buffer.Memmove's length #96311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
